sect1.title: General
sect1.para: Measurement values are collected from different SW module. And this value are provided to tester when read request is given. This component provides interface to DCM to read Measurement Values.

MeasurementValue component consist of ECU_Diag measurement DIDs which help read the condition and mode the ECU is in, NW_Ethernet measurements DIDs which help to read the current status of the IP Network parts, such as the MAC addresses of an ethernet switch port,etc. The isBBR_MeasureValues contains those DIDs that are configured for reading tail light measurements.The KLR_MeasureValues contains DIDs that are configured for reading the Kapazitives Lenkrad (Capacitive steering wheel)- touch recognition related measurements. The MFL_MeasureValues contains those DIDs that are configured for reading measurements of Multifunctional steering wheel and the cruise control switch status.
